lyrics:
15 contributorsevil boys lyricsintro
those boys are always up to something
and its bringing me to tears cause
just before you get home it always just magically disappears

chorus
those boys are evil
but before you get home they somehow always clean up the mess
those boys are evil
let me spell out for you mom
evilboys

verse 1
they built a rollercoaster
and a beach in the backyard
drove cattle through the city
and messed up the boulevard
they took me back in time when we went to that museum
they built 50 feet tree house robots
but still you didnt see them

chorus
those boys are evil
those crazy shimanigans caused me all kinds of distress
those boys are evil
sing it with me
evilboys
you might also likebridge
i know you think theyre saints
but mom im here to tell
those boys theyre just evil

chorus
those boys are evil
theyre makin me feel like my head is in hydraulic press
and that dont feel to good
those boys are evil
everybody
evilboys
thats what im talkin about
evilboys
thats right those boys are evil little boysembed
